title: Fulfilling the Contract
description: Nick Chase's first-ever blind date ends in disaster, leaving his date in breach of a very strange contract that costs her a huge completion bonus. Bleeding-heart Nick gets more than he bargained for when he egotiates to fulfil the contract for her and secure her bonus. Tough and mysterious Elsa Crane runs Mount Vegas, which offers voyeuristic pleasures for a price. Nick's job, with Elsa and her staff, is to give clients something worth seeing. As Nick and Elsa's relationship sizzles and ignites in ways neither expected things get positively dangerous in this sequel to The Initiation of Ms Holly.
author: K.D. Grace
